Question & Options:
Which statements are true regarding the relationships and roles of the individuals and production company involved in the movie *Baar Baar Dekho*?
Options:
A. A) Katrina Kaif starred opposite Sidharth Malhotra in the film.
B. B) Sidharth Malhotra was the male lead in a film produced by Excel Entertainment.
C. C) Nitya Mehra was the director making her debut with Excel Entertainment.
D. D) Excel Entertainment was known for producing films with established directors only.
Correct Answer: A) Katrina Kaif starred opposite Sidharth Malhotra in the film., B) Sidharth Malhotra was the male lead in a film produced by Excel Entertainment., C) Nitya Mehra was the director making her debut with Excel Entertainment.
